name: Custom
description: Start with balanced defaults and customize everything.

aov.help: Revenue per transaction or billing event.

orders_per_month.help: How often a customer transacts each month.

gross_margin_pct.help: What percentage of revenue do you keep after direct costs?

variable_cost_per_order.help: Per-transaction variable costs: fulfillment, processing, support.

monthly_churn_rate.help: What % of customers do you lose each month?

monthly_arpu_growth_rate.help: Do retained customers spend more over time?

monthly_fixed_costs.help: Monthly fixed overhead: rent, salaries, tech infrastructure.
